attributes.action: Change the driving test to include a personality test, to help decrease insurance for certain people regardless of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I suggest to change the driving test to include a personality test, to help decrease insurance for certain people regardless of age. 

I think that all people who passed their test can optionally take a personality test to decrease their insurance, and people will be allowed to retake the test after a certain time period.
